titleStmt.title: The suruay or topographical description of France with a new mappe, helping greatly for the surueying of euery particular country, cittye, fortresse, riuer, mountaine, and forrest therein: collected out of sundry approued authors: very amply, truly, and historically digested, for the pleasure of those who desire to be throughly acquainted in the state of the kingdome & dominion of France.
titleStmt.author: Eliot, John.
Plancius, Petrus, d. 1622, cartographer.
Duetecum, Baptista, engraver.

publicationStmt.publisher: Imprinted by Iohn Wolfe, and are to bee sold at his shop at Poules chayne,

notesStmt.note: The map, lacking in most copies, is drawn by Petrus Plancius, engraved by Baptista Duetecum, and dated 1592.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
